fields.name: The Magic Kingdom
fields.description: Recently, a local evil sorcerer was spying on you through his crystal ball. He overheard you talking about him and, having a short temper like most evil sorcerers, he instantly banished you to the Magic Kingdom, thinking you would never return.
fields.intro_text: Recently, a local evil sorcerer was spying on you through his crystal ball. He overheard you talking about him and, having a short temper like most evil sorcerers, he instantly banished you to the Magic Kingdom, thinking you would never return.

fields.name: in the park. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a large park.  You know that it is a park because you see a sign that says, "Magic Kingdom State Park".  There are well-traveled trails leading in all four directions.

fields.name: on a north/south trail.
fields.description: You are on a broad and worn trail.  There is an impenetrable, thorny hedge on both sides of the trail.

fields.name: on an east/west trail.
fields.description: As you travel, you notice a lot of picnic litter along the sides of the trail.

fields.name: at a T-intersection; E/W by north.
fields.description: You are at a small intersection in the trail.  All is quiet and you see nothing of interest.

fields.name: on an east/west trail.
fields.description: As you travel, you notice a red-brown smear along the ground.

fields.name: in a large clearing. (N/S/D)
fields.description: You are standing in a large clearing with a mine shaft in the middle. The area around the shaft opening is burnt and charred. Trails lead north and south.

fields.name: on the north dock. (E/W)
fields.description: You are on a large dock with a sign stating it to be the "North Dock".  You see strange yellow boats moored to the west.  A group of enormous guards are here, lounging about.

fields.name: in a small clearing. (W)
fields.description: The ground here is littered with bones, strips of rotting flesh, and empty beer cans.  The only exit is the trail west.

fields.name: at a bend in the trail. (E/S)
fields.description: The trail turns sharply here from east to south.  A white picket fence is along the sides of this section of the trail.  There is an unpleasant odor from the south.

fields.name: in the reptile clearing. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small clearing with a sign stating it as "The Reptile Clearing".  The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: at the cess pool. (N)
fields.description: You have come to a large clearing.  Unfortunately, most of the clearing is occupied by a large cess pool.  With your first breath, the overpowering odor unplugs your sinuses for life.  The only exit for fresh air is north.

fields.name: sailing the river. (S/E)
fields.description: You are in a boat on the river. The river flows from north to south, and the strong current prevents you from going north. To the east is the dock area, and west is a high concrete wall with a sign reading, "Magic Kingdom Corp. of Engineers -- Flood Control Project".

fields.name: sailing the river. (S)
fields.description: The strong current prevents travel north and the concrete wall blocks your path east and west.  You have no choice but to sail south.

fields.name: on the middle dock. (E/W)
fields.description: You tie your boat securely to the dock.  Going east will take you back on the river.  To the west is a small, run down shack.  There is a thick layer of mud here.

fields.name: in the room of the wise. (E)
fields.description: You are in a room smelling of incense and covered in a strange blue mist.  Through the mist, you see an inscription.  The only exit is east.

fields.name: sailing the river. (S)
fields.description: To the east and west are the walls of the flood control project and the current prevents northward sailing, so your only choice is to go south.  Some vandal has managed to spray-paint one of the walls, "FOR A GOOD TIME CALL 279-8861".

fields.name: sailing the river. (E/S)
fields.description: To the east is a small, rickety dock.  You can hear a constant roar to the south and see a string of red buoys.

fields.name: on the south dock. (E/W)
fields.description: To the west is the river and your boat. To the east is a strange, misty trail.

fields.name: sailing the river. (N/S)
fields.description: The roar to the south is getting louder now.  A long rope is strung along the east side, making it possible to go back north.

fields.name: on a north/south trail.
fields.description: To the north the trail slopes upward towards a mountain pass.  Towering walls of black stone prevent travel to the east and west.

fields.name: at a T-intersection; N/S by east.
fields.description: Along the west side of the trail is a 1000 meter drop-off.  The trail leads north/south (although you can't see to what) and there is a narrow gap to the east.

fields.name: in an eagle's nest. (W)
fields.description: You are in the nest of a giant black eagle.  The only exit is through a crack in the cliff to the west.  The nest is strewn with bones (some of which appear to be human) and giant eagle droppings.

fields.name: at the edge of a cliff. (S/D)
fields.description: You have reached the highest point of the mountain.  Low clouds limit your visibility and the air is thin, cold, and damp.  Below you there appear to be precarious hand holds carved into the stone, leading down the steep cliff.

fields.name: outside a castle. (N/U)
fields.description: To the north lies a slightly run-down, yet imposing stone castle.  You can also scale back up the cliff.

fields.name: in the castle. (S)
fields.description: You are in the entry room of the castle.  The stone walls have been decorated with ornate tapestries.  Guards firmly block your path in all directions but back south.

fields.name: in an abandoned mine shaft. (N/S/E/W/U)
fields.description: You are at the bottom of a mine shaft.  You can climb back up or follow the tunnels which lead off in all directions.

fields.name: in a north/south tunnel.
fields.description: You are in a dank tunnel running from north to south.  The walls are black with coal dust, and there is a purple glow coming from the north.

fields.name: in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: You are in a dank tunnel running from east to west.  The walls are composed of strange, iridescent mineral.  You smell a familiar aroma from the east; you can't place it but it makes your mouth water.

fields.name: in a north/south tunnel.
fields.description: You are in a dank tunnel running from north to south.  The walls are charred black, and there is a flickering orange glow coming from the south.

fields.name: in the purple room. (S)
fields.description: A slimy purple substance seems to cover the entire surface of this small cave.  The only way out is south.

fields.name: in a small chamber. (E)
fields.description: The walls here are covered with baseball posters and pennants.  The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: in the chocolate room. (W)
fields.description: The walls of this small cave are covered with chocolate frosting!  The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: in the dragon chamber. (N)
fields.description: You are in a large chamber.  The walls are charred black and there is an odor of burning sulfur in the air.  The only exit lies to the north.

fields.name: sailing the river. (S/W)
fields.description: The current flows strongly south.  To the west is a large dock and a small shack.

fields.name: scaling the cliff. (U/D)
fields.description: You are scaling the steep cliff using worn hand and foot holds.  Slippery moss and crumbling rock make the going treacherous; one false move could mean sudden death.  Clouds make it impossible to see above or below.

fields.name: in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: You are in a dank tunnel running from east to west.  The walls of the tunnel appear to have been carved from solid granite.

fields.name: in a box canyon. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are in a box canyon which opens to the south.  To the north and east are narrow openings in the canyon walls.

fields.name: in a narrow pass. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a narrow north/south passage between two sheer rock walls.  You can barely squeeze through by turning sideways.

fields.name: at a narrow turn. (N/W)
fields.description: You are at a very narrow, ninety-degree turn between two sheer rock walls.  It opens to the west and rises slightly to the north.

fields.name: in the rattlers' den. (S)
fields.description: OOPS!  You stumbled into a rattlesnake den!  Rock walls rise steeply on all sides and the only opening is to the south.

fields.name: sword
fields.description: You see a high-quality sword.  It appears to be a Marcos brand.

fields.name: magic bow
fields.description: You see a crossbow made of polished ebony. It feels exceptionally light and is obviously magical.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: You see a high-quality mace.  It appears to be a Marcos brand.

fields.name: cup of coffee
fields.description: You see a cup of fresh coffee simmering here.  It smells refreshing.

fields.name: jewels
fields.description: You see a small bag of valuable jewels here.

fields.name: gold turd
fields.description: You see a (yech) turd made of solid gold.

fields.name: gold egg
fields.description: You see an egg which appears to be made of solid gold.  It looks rather heavy.

fields.name: diamonds
fields.description: You see a small bag of diamonds.

fields.name: magic bat
fields.description: You see a glowing baseball bat.  It is obviously magical.

fields.name: purple gem
fields.description: You see a gem unlike any you have ever seen.  It is perfectly round and it glows with a bright purple light.

fields.name: doughnut
fields.description: You see a delicious looking doughnut with chocolate glaze.  There seems to be a message written on it in white frosting.

fields.name: gold chain
fields.description: You see a well-crafted chain of golden links.  It is ornated with diamonds, rubies, sapphires, and other valuable stones.

fields.name: turquoise
fields.description: You see a large piece of turquoise, a valuable blue stone.

fields.name: inscription
fields.description: You see an inscription on the wall that reads, "A WORD TO THE WISE:  ALWAYS EXAMINE YOUR FOOD BEFORE YOU EAT IT."

fields.name: chained princess
fields.description: You see an attractive young woman in tattered robes chained to the wall.  Although her clothing is dirty and torn, you recognize it as being that of a princess.

fields.name: pass
fields.description: The King hands you a small scroll.  He explains that it gives you permission to explore anywhere in the lands.  If anybody stops you, just GIVE the pass to them.

fields.name: dynamite
fields.description: You see a discarded stick of dynamite (what a cool toy to leave lying around!) here.  It could be useful to blow a hole in something ("USE DYNAMITE").

fields.name: boulder
fields.description: An enormous boulder has been placed in front of the mine shaft to prevent entry.

fields.name: Alfred's body
fields.description: You see the body of good old Alfred.

fields.name: dead lizard
fields.description: You see the dead carcass of the lizard.

fields.name: Orc's body
fields.description: You see the stinking dead body of the orc.

fields.name: Cess-Pool Monster's body
fields.description: You see the slimy remains of the cess-pool monster.

fields.name: dead squid
fields.description: You see the limp body of the giant squid floating away.

fields.name: dead eagle
fields.description: You see the black eagle's body.

fields.name: Semi-Giant's body
fields.description: You see the huge body of the dead semi-giant.

fields.name: Purple People-Eater's body
fields.description: You see the shapeless remains of the Purple People-Eater.

fields.name: Baseball Player's body
fields.description: You see the baseball player's body.

fields.name: dead dragon
fields.description: You see the lifeless body of the small dragon.

fields.name: Princess Julene's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of the princess.  The King will be very sad when you bring her to him.

fields.name: Timber Rattler's body
fields.description: You see the dead timber rattler.

fields.name: Diamondback's body
fields.description: You see the dead diamondback.

fields.name: Prairie Rattler's body
fields.description: You see the dead prairie rattler.

fields.name: Sidewinder's body
fields.description: You see the dead sidewinder.

fields.name: King's body
fields.description: You see the King fall over dead.  It must be a pretty amazing sight since he can never die within this adventure.  Cheater!

fields.name: Dock Guard's body
fields.description: Well, somehow you managed to kill the dock guard and survive.  Congratulations, bleeder of stones.  Don't expect your situation to improve any.

fields.name: Kobold's body
fields.description: You see the kobold keel over and die.  Whoopee.

fields.name: Bugbear's body
fields.description: The bugbear moans and grunts as he coughs up most of his vital organs and dies.

fields.text: The King speaks, "I have a job for an adventurer like you!  My daughter, Julene, has been missing for several years now.  Find out what happened to her and bring her back to me," he pauses and wipes away a tear, "Dead or alive."
The King weeps at the sight of his dead daughter.  He then thanks you for your time and says a word that you can't understand.  You are transported back to the Main Hall.
The King is overjoyed to see his daughter again.  He pays you a reward of 1,000 gold pieces and says a word that you can't understand.  You are then transported to the Main Hall.
As the guard falls, you feel several sword thrust through your back.  You hear a voice say, "In your next life, try doing something sensible for a change!"

You see the most beautiful sight ever, the Waterfall of the Magic Kingdom!  It's a 1000 ft. drop into the plains below from a river that flows out of the ice-capped mountains and through the plateau where most of the Magic Kingdom is located.
Too bad you saw it from the river...
The coffee tastes delicious!  You suddenly feel all of your attributes increase as you watch the cup vanish before your eyes.
A strange mist surrounds you and you find yourself teleported back to the park.
It says:  POISONS DRAGONS AMONG OTHER THINGS.
You would fall to your death.

fields.name: Alfred
fields.description: You see a human warrior wearing plate armor and armed with a sword.  He smiles and says, "Hi, I'm Alfred."

fields.name: Lizard
fields.description: You see an 18-foot lizard.  As his huge mouth opens and closes, you can see the rows of long, needle-pointed teeth.  You watch, fascinated, as brown drool slides from his lips to the earth where it hisses to vapor and leaves a small hole.

fields.name: Orc
fields.description: You see and ugly, foul-smelling orc clad in leather armor.  He is sucking stale beer from a rusty can, using a straw stuck in his left nostril.  Slung over his shoulder is a polished ebony bow that seems to glow strangely.

fields.name: Cess-Pool Monster
fields.description: As you are looking into the (yech) cess pool, a slimy tentacle grabs your legs.  Two more wrap around your body, others attempt to remove your arms from their sockets, and a slimy sucker is clamped across your nose and mouth.

fields.name: Giant Squid
fields.description: A tentacle suddenly grabs you and tries pulling you into the water.  As other tentacles beat at your head and body, you see the beak-likes jaws of a giant squid!

fields.name: Black Eagle
fields.description: You see an enormous black eagle swooping toward you.  Its razor-sharp talons are aimed at your heart, while its fierce beak attempts to cut off your head.  Its piercing blood-red eyes chill your soul.

fields.name: Semi-Giant
fields.description: You see a warrior who is unusually tall, over 15 feet.  He wields a mace the size of a tree trunk and he is wearing leather armor which appears to be made from the hides of four oxen.  He is a semi-giant.

fields.name: Purple People-Eater
fields.description: You see a creature with a single eye and a short horn on its head flying around the room.  It is a purple people-eater!

fields.name: Baseball Player
fields.description: You see a man in a baseball uniform.  He is hitting an old, torn baseball with a glowing (and obviously magical) bat.  Whenever the ball hits the wall it makes another big dent.

fields.name: Small Dragon
fields.description: You see a dragon which looks exactly like one pictured in a mural at the Main Hall. It is nine feet tall - not as big as you'd expect a dragon to be - but still large and deadly. Orange flames shoot from his nostrils and light up the scorched room.

fields.name: Princess Julene
fields.description: The Princess says, "Thank you for rescuing me.  I've been waiting five years to get back and see my favorite soap operas."

fields.name: Timber Rattler
fields.description: You see a heavy-bodied rattlesnake hissing at you!

fields.name: Diamondback
fields.description: You see a large rattlesnake with a distinctive diamondback pattern.

fields.name: Prairie Rattler
fields.description: You see a small buff-colored rattlesnake coiled and ready to strike!

fields.name: Sidewinder
fields.description: You see a medium-sized rattlesnake moving towards you with a rapid, sideways crawl.

fields.name: King
fields.description: You see a sad-looking man in bright flowing robes.  He has long gray sideburns and wears a tarnished crown.  He is the pathetic ruler of the Magic Kingdom.

fields.name: Dock Guard
fields.description: You see a big, mean-looking guard here.  He is standing with his arms crossed, sizing you up.

fields.name: Kobold
fields.description: You see a normal, wimpy little kobold here.  It snarls and leaps towards you.

fields.name: Bugbear
fields.description: You see an ugly creature with yellowish skin and fur.  It was slapping the kobold around when you entered.  He grunts at you menacingly.

fields.question: The Magic Kingdom  --  How do I escape The Magic Kingdom?
The Magic Kingdom  --  Where is the princess?
The Magic Kingdom  --  How do I get into the mine?
The Magic Kingdom  --  How do I get past the dock guard?
The Magic Kingdom  --  How do I kill the dragon?

fields.answer: The King has the power to teleport you home, find him.
You will find her somewhere in the abandoned mine.
Find the stick of dynamite and USE it on the mine shaft.
You must first see the King and get the pass.  Then GIVE it to the guard.
Well, if you're tough enough, just fight him.
You can also GIVE the poisonous doughnut to him.
